1370: Ermegardis was born in Paternoster straetje in 1370.
Got married to Segher at age 25 in 1370.
Gave birth to Jacobus in 1370 at age 25.
1390: Died while giving birth to Folcard in 1390 at age 45.
1373: Gave birth to Gherbaren in 1373 at age 28.
1377: Gave birth to Dammas in 1377 at age 32.
1378: Gave birth to Heinhocа in 1378 at age 33.
Lost son Heinhocа when Heinhocа was 1 years old.
1382: Lost son Gherbaren when Gherbaren was 10 years old.
1384: Gave birth to Rycaldis in 1384 at age 39.
1385: Gave birth to Arnulphus in 1385 at age 40.
1386: Gave birth to Geraldus in 1386 at age 41.
